learning_objective: Model daily processes by creating and following algorithms (sets of step-by-step instructions) to complete tasks.
question_str:
{
    "Question": "Alex has been recruited by a staffing agency to assist with a company's hiring process. They need to create a program algorithm to perform the process of 'Reviewing Applicants' as described by the company: First, an application is received. Next, if the application is complete, it's assigned to a hiring manager. If the application is incomplete, it's set aside. If the hiring manager rates the application positively, schedule an interview. If it's rated negatively, inform the applicant that they won't be moving forward. Which of the following pseudocodes best represents this process?",
    "Answer1": "procedure ReviewingApplicants
    while applications remain       
    if application is complete then 
        assign to hiring manager  
        if rated positively
            schedule interview
        else
            reject applicant
        end if
    else 
        set aside
    end if
    end while
end procedure",
    "Answer2": "procedure ReviewingApplicants
    while applications remain
    if application is incomplete
        set aside
    else 
        assign to hiring manager
        if application is incompelete 
            set aside
        else 
            reject or interview applicant
        end if
    end if
    end while
end procedure",
    "Answer3": "procedure ReviewingApplicants
    while applications remain
        assign to hiring manager
        if rated negatively
            reject applicant
        else
            schedule interview
        end if
    end while
end procedure",
    "Answer4": "procedure ReviewingApplicants
    while applications remain
        if application is complete
            assign to hiring manager
            if rated negatively
                reject applicant
            else
                schedule interview
            end if
        end if
    end while
end procedure",
    "CorrectAnswer": "1",
    "Explanation": "The proper pseudocode would include all steps from receiving the application, checking if it's complete or not, assigning it to a hiring manager, up to making a decision based on the manager's rating and either scheduling an interview or rejecting the candidate."
}
